Detailed Description

Defines functions that generate common 2d transformation matrices.

<glm/gtx/matrix_transform_2d.hpp> need to be included to use these functionalities.

Function Documentation

template<typename T, precision P>
GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tmat3x3< T, P > glm::rotate ( detail::tmat3x3< T, P > const &  m,
T const &  angle 
) [inline]

Builds a rotation 3 * 3 matrix created from an angle.

Parameters:
m Input matrix multiplied by this translation matrix.
angle Rotation angle expressed in radians if GLM_FORCE_RADIANS is defined or degrees otherwise.

References glm::cos(), glm::radians(), and glm::sin().

00049         {
00050         #ifdef GLM_FORCE_RADIANS
00051                 T a = angle;
00052         #else
00053                 T a = radians(angle);           
00054         #endif
00055                 T c = cos(a);
00056                 T s = sin(a);
00057 
00058                 detail::tmat3x3<T, P> Result(detail::tmat3x3<T, P>::_null);
00059                 Result[0] = m[0] * c + m[1] * s;
00060                 Result[1] = m[0] * -s + m[1] * c;
00061                 Result[2] = m[2];
00062                 return Result;
00063         }
